captions.text:
Hey, I'm Mikey from
the ICONic Boyz.

I'm 12, and I'm here at
ICON Dance Complex
getting ready to rehearse.
I was in sixth grade.

I'm going into seventh
grade as of now.

And it's the summertime,
thank God.

I don't feel like going
back to school yet.

I've been dancing myself,
as of now, it's
been about five years.

I've always been at the Complex
and there's just been
an amazing experience.

The best thing about being in
the ICONic Boyz is that we're

all like a brotherhood, and we
love being together, and when
we dance we have chemistry.

Well, we're really excited
for Hip-Hop
International in Vegas.
We're gearing up for it.

There's gonna be a lot of
dancers there competing, and

we just can't wait, hopefully,
that Vegas will like us.

If you haven't got your
tickets for Hip-Hop

International yet you'd better
get them, because the ICONic

Boyz are gearing up and
you wanna be there.
I do not have a girlfriend.
No, I am single as of now.
Single's fine.

I look for her eyes-- basically
her whole face and
her body language.
You know, suave type.
And a good personality.

To other dancers out there
just follow your dreams.
Just do what you want to do.
Don't be afraid to do it.
If you wanna dance, dance.

It's a great thing and just
follow your dreams.
Be iconic.

title: ICONic Boyz - Mike 'Spikey Mikey' Fusco Tells All
